title: Ticket #4860: Standard universe on a mixed-mode pool with IPv6 DNS records.
description:
Francesco Prelz (INFN) reports that running 8.3.2 on a mixed-mode pool with IPv6 DNS (AAAA) records causes standard universe jobs to make no progress. Presumably, they (probably the old starter) get an IPv6 address and can't do anything useful with it.

Francesco provided a patch (attached) with two parts: one, to get the standard universes' bindWithin() to work with IPv6; two, to prefer not IPv4 but the host machine's preferred protocol where the code presently makes an arbitrary choice. The former appeared to suffice to get standard universe jobs working (?!) in 8.1.x, and the latter a new requirement for 8.3.x.
